metadata.title: Women’s Ring Toe Loop Slide Flat Sandals Pearls Bohemia Strappy Summer Beach Boho Casual Shoes
features: ✿✿Durable rubber sole for long time wear, soft lining, you can wear the sandals all-day long with no discomfort.

✿✿Simple but fashion style, easy to match different clothing such as jeans and dress, fit most occasions like party, work, date, wedding, cocktail, nightclub, outdoor, vocation, homecoming.High quality mateial, durable enough for your daily wear, it's a great gift for yourself, your family or your friends.

✿✿Attention: Please check our Size Chart (Not Amazon's Size Chart) on image or in the description below to make sure the best fit for you. If you not sure the Size, please contact us without hesitation.
✿✿Let customer satisfied is our aim, we are constantly making improvements based on your need. So please contact us if you get damaged or incorrect item.
description: ☆☆☆☆☆Welcome to MORECOME☆☆☆☆☆ MORECOME is an international online fashion clothing store, Committed to providing customers with cost-effective products. Let customer satisfied is our aim, So please contact us if you get damaged or incorrect item. Note: Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement. Due to the light and screen setting difference, the item's color may be slightly different from the pictures.
